snippet: The threat of a fourth consecutive defeat is looming large for Manchester United and their manager David Moyes, yet the beleaguered Scot feels things are on the verge of turning for his struggling side....

headline.print_headline: Moyes Banks on Better Luck in Swansea Sequel
headline.main: Moyes Banks on Better Luck in Swansea Sequel

lead_paragraph: The threat of a fourth consecutive defeat is looming large for Manchester United and their manager David Moyes, yet the beleaguered Scot feels things are on the verge of turning for his struggling side.
